name: Epic Skater 2
description: Arcade skateboarding meets fast-paced 2.5D platforming. Blast epic combos in endless procedural skating and 40 handcrafted levels. Over 2000 challenges and a billion clothing combinations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5550 w/ 1024 MB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7870 w/ 1024 MB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
